barge.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a large low boat with a flat bottom, used for carrying goods on a canal or river
barge.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to move somewhere in a rough careless way, often hitting against things
barge.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: She ran outside, barging past bushes and shrubs.
She barged her way through the shopping crowds.
barge your way through/to etc something
